timeline.message:
Make JdbcTypeHandle.decimalDigits optional

The `DECIMAL_DIGITS` field is nullable and the distinction is sometimes
important.

timeline.bodyText: We are not using OptionalInt very often. I know the interface is less rich than Optional<Integer>. Is that a reason?
timeline.author: losipiuk

replies.bodyText: richness -- optionalint is warranted, when there is a benefit
replies.author: findepi

timeline.author: losipiuk

timeline.message: Use correct type in column declaration
Add timestamp test case before epoch with fraction
